name: LA LAA (Early Access)
description:
LA LAA is a beautiful and colourful side-scroller game that uses the input of players voice input to progress through this action adventure game. Not only are there multiple enemies to defeat but also areas that provide a unique parkour experience for players to constantly keep the gameplay fresh and different.

THE WORLD: Experience the stunning world  that uses a mixture of bright vibrant colours and pixel art to create a unique style.

VOICE: With puzzles located throughout the levels there can only be one way to solve them... using your voice. By using voice input in a microphone players can complete puzzles to unlock areas of maps to progress further.

EARLY ACCESS: As an early access game there is still more to be done, primarily this is adding a complex story to allow for players to get attached to the main character Laa. Also adding a unique soothing soundtrack to the game is vital in allowing players to immerse themselves in the stunning side-scroller game.

Ensure microphone is connected when playing!
